DefaultUserData.AboutAuthor:
Happy father and husband. IBMer for over 10 years, currently at Advisory IT Specialist position. Big fan of .NET framework. I treat software development more like a hobby, but this might change one day... Exploring wide spectrum of IT technologies, starting from automation tools, going through mobile device management, ending on cloud solutions.

I decided to create this blog for a simple reason - I needed motivation to sit down, learn something new and share my experience with others on the occasion. I hope you will find here something interesting and maybe even useful.
